title: REA T210 Series 7 Cards for Sale...** ALL CARDS SOLD!! **
author: shammus

posts.post_title: REA T210 Series 7 Cards for Sale...** ALL CARDS SOLD!! **
posts.post_content:
Have a nice group of t210-7s available for individual sale from the recent REA Auction.  Huge, blown-up scans are available at this link if anyone would like to see better scans than the one below - [url]https://bid.robertedwardauctions.com/bids/bidplace?itemid=139042[/url]

I've included prices for individual sale below.  All prices include shipping  - 

** ALL CARDS HAVE BEEN SOLD!! **


Bonner (Rocky Mount) GD -- Sharp Photo! -- $80SOLD!! 
Cabrol (Raleigh) GD -- $80
Fulton (Goldsboro) FR/GD -- $70
Griffin (Rocky Mount) GD -- $80 SOLD!!
Gunderson (Goldsboro) FR -- Tougher card! -- $65 SOLD!!
Hobbs (Raleigh) PR -- $35
MacDonald (Goldsboro) FR -- $50 SOLD!!
Malcolm (Goldsboro) VG/EX -- $150 SOLD!!
McCormac (Raleigh) FR/GD -- $70
McGeeham (Wilson) FR -- $60
Morgan (Goldsboro) GD-- $85 SOLD!!
Reeves (Rocky Mount) GD -- $80 SOLD!!
Richardson (Raleigh) PR/FR -- $45
Sherrill (Raleigh)  PR (tape repair) -- $40
Stoehr (Goldsboro) GD -- $80 SOLD!!


Definitely some tougher cards from this set available here!  Thanks in advance!!
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=569078&d=1682790723[/IMG]

Several of the t210s have sold and I removed them from the list above while adding quite a few more.  The list of 15 for sale up above is now up to date.

Scans available here - [url]https://bid.robertedwardauctions.com/bids/bidplace?itemid=139042[/url]

Thanks in advance,
Brian

Down to only 12 t210 Series 7 cards left.  I've dropped prices on remaining cards and will knock a few more bucks off for those interested in purchasing multiple cards.  Thanks in advance!

Brian

Several more cards off the board.  Down to just seven cards remaining!
